name: grey-t-shirt
description: A classic grey t-shirt made from soft, breathable fabric. Perfect for casual wear or layering.

name: blue-T-shirt
description: A vibrant blue t-shirt with a modern fit and high-quality material. Ideal for adding a pop of color to your wardrobe.

name: t-shirt-nike
description: Sporty and stylish, this Nike t-shirt offers a comfortable fit and a sleek design. Great for both workouts and casual outings.

name: iphone11
description: The iPhone 11 features a sleek design and powerful performance. It offers a dual-camera system for high-quality photos and videos.

name: iphone12pro
description: The iPhone 12 Pro delivers exceptional performance with its A14 Bionic chip and stunning Super Retina XDR display. Ideal for photography enthusiasts with its advanced camera system.

name: iphone14
description: The iPhone 14 brings innovative features and a refined design. Experience top-notch performance and enhanced photography capabilities.

name: iphoneX
description: The iPhone X combines a stunning OLED display with a powerful processor. Its face recognition technology offers a futuristic touch.

name: cap1
description: A stylish cap with an adjustable strap for a perfect fit. Great for casual days out or sports activities.

name: cap2
description: This cap features a trendy design and a comfortable fit. Ideal for sunny days and adding a cool touch to your outfit.

name: cap3
description: A durable and fashionable cap perfect for outdoor adventures. Offers excellent sun protection and style.

name: cap4
description: Designed for comfort and style, this cap is a great addition to any casual outfit. Features an adjustable strap for a customizable fit.

name: cap5
description: A sleek cap with a modern design and quality construction. Perfect for everyday wear or sports activities.

name: playstation3
description: The PlayStation 3 offers a great gaming experience with its impressive library of games and multimedia features. Enjoy high-definition graphics and an extensive game selection.

name: playstation5
description: The PlayStation 5 delivers cutting-edge gaming with its advanced hardware and lightning-fast load times. Experience immersive graphics and a new level of gameplay.

name: playstation4
description: The PlayStation 4 offers a robust gaming experience with a vast library of titles and high-quality graphics. A popular choice for gamers of all levels.
